trans-unit.source: Encapsulates properties related to scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 封装与滚动有关的属性。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个抽象类。

trans-unit.source: The actual derived classes used directly by Windows Forms are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties>, which are returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HorizontalScroll%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VerticalScroll%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.
trans-unit.target: 直接使用 Windows 窗体的实际派生的类是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties>，这由返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HorizontalScroll%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VerticalScroll%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl" /> whose scrolling properties this object describes.
trans-unit.target: 由此对象描述其滚动属性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: You cannot instantiate this class directly, as it is abstract.
trans-unit.target: 你直接，不能实例化此类，因为它是抽象。

trans-unit.source: You must instantiate one of its derived classes instead, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties>.
trans-unit.target: 你必须实例化一个及其派生类，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the scroll bar can be used on the container.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否可在容器上使用滚动条。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the scroll bar can be used; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以使用滚动条，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance to move a scroll bar in response to a large scroll command.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在响应大范围滚动命令时滚动条的移动距离。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> describing how far, in pixels, to move the scroll bar in response to a large change.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，说明在响应大范围更改时滚动条的移动距离（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.LargeChange%2A> is used to determine how far the scroll bar is moved in response to a request to move a considerable distance, such as when the user presses the PAGE UP or PAGE DOWN button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.LargeChange%2A> 用于确定在响应的请求将相当长的距离，例如当用户按 PAGE UP 或 PAGE DOWN 按钮移动滚动条的距离。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.LargeChange" /> cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.LargeChange" /> 不能小于零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the upper limit of the scrollable range.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可滚动范围的上限。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the maximum range of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示滚动条的最大范围。

trans-unit.source: If the new value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Maximum%2A> is less than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Minimum%2A>, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Minimum%2A> is set equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Maximum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Maximum%2A>是小于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Minimum%2A>，然后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Minimum%2A>设置为等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Maximum%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lower limit of the scrollable range.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可滚动范围的下限。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the lower range of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示滚动条的最小范围。

trans-unit.source: If the new value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Minimum%2A> is greater than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Maximum%2A>, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Maximum%2A> is set equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Minimum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Minimum%2A>大于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Maximum%2A>，然后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Maximum%2A>设置为等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Minimum%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Minimum" /> cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.Minimum" /> 不能小于零。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control to which this scroll information applies.
trans-unit.target: 获取要应用此滚动信息的控件。

trans-unit.source: The control to which this scroll information applies.
trans-unit.target: 要应用此滚动信息的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance to move a scroll bar in response to a small scroll command.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在响应小范围滚动命令时滚动条的移动距离。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing how far, in pixels, to move the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示滚动条的移动距离（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.SmallChange%2A> is used to calculate how far to move the scroll bar in response to an arrow key click or a click on a scroll bar button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollProperties.SmallChange%2A> 用于计算如何远的滚动条以响应箭头键或单击在上移动滚动栏按钮。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a numeric value that represents the current position of the scroll bar box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示滚动条框的当前位置的数值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the position of the scroll bar box, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示滚动条框的位置（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the scroll bar can be seen by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以看到滚动条。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if it can be seen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以看到滚动条，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
